data.text: @tjgillis @goonda13 @CBCNS Can you actually make a point or ya just haven't grown up enough yet? Tell me what the vaccine does for ya, aside from harm you I'd be happy to discuss.
@BonesMotherfuck @goonda13 @CBCNS jesus, detached from reality much there bud?

@Caronewood @JasonLe23912236 @CBCNS There is a very serious fact that y’all seem to be ignoring. We are 84% “fully vaxxed” in NS, yet deaths among the elderly and at risk are higher then in 2020. Why doesn’t that register as strange to any of you?
@Rye902 @CBCNS @TimHoustonNS They have been using deceptive language the entire time. They’ve labelled palliative care patients as covid deaths FFS. Cant believe a word these liars say

@goonda13 @CBCNS Do you know how many elderly or at risk Nova Scotians died in a given year before “covid”? Maybe you should look into that before you think the numbers we are seeing are exceptional. I do know that we seeing more covid deaths with 84% fully vaxxed than in 2020….

@willys709 @CBCNS Yeah. The lifting of the passport today is the reason for the 7 deaths. Good comment. The fact the vax pass has been in since Oct 4th and more of the elderly are dying now than 2020 should tell you all you need to know about the vax pass.

@goonda13 @CBCNS Masks are scientifically proven to spread viruses and cause other health problems. The vaccine doesn't stop infection or transmission, it literally does nothing except harm you. Ya wanna be safe then look out for yourself and stop looking to the government like a child.

@annwmac @samiamns @CBCNS Again I trust Dr. Strang who has led us to being one of the safest places in the world through this pandemic. You clearly don’t and have anointed yourself to knowing more about public health than him. Are you a doctor?

@CBCNS The amount of otherwise normal people who now support #eugenics is truly chilling. Really shameful leadership here. Houston showing his #PandoraPapers core as complicit Cons bow to the #FluTruckKlan. Strang is just a sad figure at this point.
